title: Loss prevented?
body: What is the reason? Having see on  two matches now.

replies.body: Yup, what Yasho said. Typically occurs if the servers are having issues (people are dcing/lagging because of the server).
If im not mistaken, it is for a loss that the player has no control over. In saying this, im pretty sure it's not anything to do with other players but the game itself.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014-Loss-Prevented 

This does a better job of explaining it
